properties.description: Free Coffee Morning (open Mondays 10.00am - 12.00noon, except Bank Holidays) We will be open 10.00am - 12.00pm on Mondays
properties.title: New Life Baptist Church, Northallerton

properties.address: 1 Thirsk Road, Northallerton, North Yorkshire DL6 1PT
properties.description: Northallerton Library is in Northallerton Town Centre, it has two floors with spaces for groups and quiet study/relaxation areas. The library is a warm and friendly place, with a variety of groups and events that run. We have free WiFi and computers for public use. Our helpful staff can offer IT support and information on a range of subjects. There are drinks machines and snacks available, all reasonably priced, you may also bring your own food/drinks. We also have newspapers delivered daily, as well as a huge range of books to browse or borrow.
properties.title: Northallerton Library

properties.address: High street, Northallerton, North Yorkshire DL7 8EG
properties.description: We are an active Church with other activities offering company and a warm space, the times below are for Coffee Pot only. Our 'Coffee Pot' runs as a cafe serving refreshments and cake/toasted tea cakes, but tea/coffee/juice & biscuits will be available free for those who need it.
properties.title: Northallerton Methodist Church

properties.address: Snape Methodist Church, Snape, Bedale, North Yorkshire
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 8th November 2023** Open from Wednesday 8th November 2023 and then on alternating Tuesdays and Wednesdays 12.30-4pm Our space is open on the first Wednesday of the month and thereafter fortnightly on a Wednesday. It is also open on the weeks in between on a Tuesday on a fortnightly basis.
properties.title: Snape Community Hub

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 8th November 2023** Working in partnership our two organisations will offer one afternoon a week alternating between our premises. A free lunch of soup and bread plus other refreshments during the afternoon are offered. Regular activites (board games, jigsaw, quiet area etc) plus organised events will be available
properties.title: Snape Institute and Snape Methodist Chapel

properties.description: Community space where people can make themselves a brew, take a comfy seat, read, craft, knit, do a jigsaw, etc. Food available.
properties.title: UpFront
